abstract: Schlumberger, the world’s biggest oilfield contractor, and First Reserve, an energy-industry buyout fund, agreed to acquire Saxon Energy Services of Canada for about $582.1 million to expand in South America.
lead_paragraph: Schlumberger, the world’s biggest oilfield contractor, and First Reserve, an energy-industry buyout fund, agreed to acquire Saxon Energy Services of Canada for about $582.1 million to expand in South America.

headline.main: Schlumberger and First Energy Reach Deal for Saxon
